summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Brush Strokes Large Ball Tip Rounder Brush (Assorted Colors) Review Date: 2019/07/26 Store: Brush Strokes Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Brush Strokes', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Special Feature': 'Not-applicable', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.8 x 2.6 x 2.6 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B004F0KBDW_US', 'UPC': '794168349933'} Review Text: Pros: This brush is so light weight and makes it so easy to create a smooth, straight look with your hair. It does not tangle at all and is easy to use.
Cons: The brush made my hair a little flat, but I have thin, fine hair that requires work to create body. Review Title: Great for smoothing and straightening hair! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cancun Collection Cacao Body Bronzer – Superfood Infused Sunless Tanning Lotion with Cacao 5.1 fl.oz, For Instant Tan in 1 minute. Review Date: 2020/02/04 Store: Cancun Collection Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Cancun Collection', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 4.6 x 1 inches; 14.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '659436986640'} Review Text: This Cancun Collection Cacao Bronzer is a fabulous alternative to getting a natural suntan from a tanning bed or from the sun due to harmful UV rays. It is also a great alternative if you do not like using self-tanners that can smell. This applies easily and blends with all skin tones. I have fair skin, but this even works on my skin color too. The bronzer blurs imperfections and stays on until you shower with soap! I recommend this product! See my pictures for more information. Review Title: Great, natural looking bronzer! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MD Complete Bright & Healthy Citrus-C Refresh Retinol + Vitamin C Multitasking Treatment Review Date: 2020/02/23 Store: MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson', 'Scent': 'Citrus', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1.25 x 4.5 inches; 2.26 Ounces', 'UPC': '850458005719'} Review Text: This MD Complete Bright & Healthy serum has all the ingredients recommended to treat fine lines, wrinkles and dull texture (Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Vitamin B, Retinol and Omega-3). However, I did not find this to be moisturizing at all and it actually dried my skin out - making my fine lines and wrinkles more noticeable. The product indicates this product is great for someone in their 20’s or 30’s - maybe that’s true, but this is not an effective product for someone 40+ dealing with aging skin. I cannot recommend this product for aging skin - maybe it’s effective for younger skin to prevent aging 🤷🏼‍♀️ - but it is not restorative if you have aging skin. Review Title: Not recommended for aging skin Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2-Pack Puretize 16.9 Oz Hand Sanitizing Gel w/Pump Tops - Extra Strength 70% Ethyl Alcohol - Moisturizing Formula with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Botanical Extracts - Quick Drying Formula Review Date: 2020/06/08 Store: Pure Daily Care Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pure Daily Care', 'Unit Count': '33.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.5 x 4.5 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '810016711360'} Review Text: This Puretize I stand hand sanitizer contains 70% ethyl alcohol and is free of dyes and strong perfumes. It has a bit of an alcohol or medicine sent but it is not overpowering. See my picture for a list of ingredients. Even though it is 70% alcohol it did not leave my skin feeling dried out. I think this is a great value for two containers it would be great to use in an office, church, school, or even at home! Overall, I like this product and recommend it! Review Title: Keeps germs away!!! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Sunsonic Electric Razor, Rechargeable Electric Shaver with Pop Up Beard Trimmer, Type-C USB Mens Electric Razor. Review Date: 2020/06/22 Store: MDDM Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MDDM', 'Special Feature': 'Rechargeable,Cordless', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Head Type': 'Rotary', 'Package Dimensions': '7.36 x 3.82 x 2.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '738629925151', 'Manufacturer': 'MDDM'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:f269f4bbb908ea03a9ffb408f24f4cd3]] This Sunsonic electric shaver for men is simple to use. It comes fully charged. To recharge it, you simply plug the cord into a usb charger and into the shaver. It does not provide a very close shave though. If you prefer a close shave, this may not be the best option for you.

If you are looking for an inexpensive electric shaver to keep in your car or in your office for emergencies, or if you are looking for one to travel with, this is a good option. The shaver also comes with a pop-up trimmer. Simply push a button on the back of the shaver and a trimmer pops up so that you can shave your neck and around ears. See my video for additional details. Review Title: Good emergency backup saver - no close shave Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: VILLAGE11FACTORY Cica Cream, Centella Soothing and Repairing Cream for Dry and Irritated Skin, Moisturizer, Anti-Wrinkles, Lightweight, Relieves Irritated Skin, Fragrance Free, Dermatologically Tested, 1.69 fl oz 50ml Review Date: 2020/06/26 Store: VILLAGE11FACTORY Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'VILLAGE11FACTORY', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'hyaluronic_acid', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 1.97 x 1.46 inches; 2.47 Ounces'} Review Text: This Derma Clear B5 Cica Cream is not oily/greasy at all. It makes my skin feel incredibly hydrating and makes my skin so very soft. It’s unclear from the packaging if this product is specifically designed to use on your face or all over. I’ve used it on my hands, elbows, and on dry spots all over my body and was pleasantly surprised at how well it worked. I didn’t notice any scent when using the lotion. My only reason for taking a star away from the rating is because of the cost of this product. You only get 1.69 fluid ounces of product, so it’s not a great value. However, I do think the product is effective! Review Title: Very moisturizing and soften skins Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine) Review Date: 2020/09/01 Store: PRETTY FRANK Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} Review Text: This Pretty Frank natural deodorant has a pretty strong Jasmine scent. The instructions say to use a piece size amount. I didn’t read that at first and applied too much making the smell over powering. If you use the appropriate amount, the smell is not too strong. It helps keep you fresh smelling all day! Keep in mind this does not have anti-perspirant in it so it will allow you to sweat. However, it should help prevent odor. I like the fact that this is aluminum free, paraben free, toxin free and petroleum free. it is also free of imitation perfumes.

So far, I like using this product but need to put it to a test on a hot humid day while exercising! If that does the trick, I will update my review to five stars. The weather in my area is very stormy, so I am unable to give this a full testing! However, this has worked for me so far wearing this under normal daily activities. Review Title: A little goes a long way! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BH DERMCENTER Retinol Serum Restores Rejuvenates and Purifies Skin, 1 oz, Reduces Appearance of Fine Lines, Non-GMO, Vegan, Cruelty Free Review Date: 2020/12/18 Store: BH DERMCENTER Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 5 inches; 1 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BHDRETSER', 'UPC': '850004068076'} Review Text: This BH DERMCENTER Retinol Serum is made in the USA. This serum is paraben free, vegan, non-GMO, and gluten free. A little of this serum goes along way. It can be used daily under your moisturizer. It contains retinal which is supposed to restore collagen to your skin, lighten dark spots, and hide fine wrinkles. Only time will tell if this serum lives up to its claims. However, I like the way it feels on my skin and it was non-irritating. Overall, I recommend this product. Review Title: Feels good on skin - non-irritating Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers Review Date: 2020/12/27 Store: LOLYSENTA Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.1 x 1.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LS17', 'UPC': '850002524062', 'Manufacturer': 'LOLYSENTA, LLC'} Review Text: This Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm is a great value for this facial kit. It’s giftable and is believed that the microneedling treatment and pink jade roller is supposed to stimulate collagen. I’ve only used both for a few days so I can’t say effective this product will be, but I’m willing to give it a try. The jade roller is great to use when applying your favorite face serum. It glides and rolls smoothly. The microneedling treatment is not too painful when you simply apply a little bit of pressure. It did not cause bleeding because I used it gently as directed. You do need to be sure to only use it on clean skin and wash it after each use. I am hoping to see more vibrant skin after using these tools for a few weeks. Review Title: Supposed to promote a more youthful appearance Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: O!GETi Vitamin C Foam Cleanser | Foaming Facial Cleanser, Perfect Pore Cleansing Foam, Face Wash for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Sebum Reducing, Moisture Control & Minimizing Pores, Korean Skin Care, Gift for Women, Paraben-free, 4.23 Oz (120g) Review Date: 2021/04/11 Store: O!GETi Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'O!GETi', 'Scent': 'Tangerine', 'Material Feature': 'Natural'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:54b0aa506bf0c71a7c1b9f3ed89e41ee]] This O!GETi vitamin C foam cleanser is a rich and thick cleaner than foams nicely on your face to help remove impurities. This leaves my face feeling very soft and looking brighter. This product includes Centella, Panthenol, Tangerine extracts, and vitamin c. It is a gentle cleanser that does not dry out my face. This does include fragrance that is not noticeable at all, and it does not irritate sensitive skin. Overall, I like this product I would recommend it. This product is made in Korea. Review Title: Foaming cleanser that brightens skin on your face Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2Pcs Mascara Black Volume and Length 4D Natural and Long Lasting Lash Blast Mascara, 0.27 Fl Oz Review Date: 2021/04/28 Store: Marine Forest Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.01 x 0.98 inches; 3.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843907382'} Review Text: This 2-piece Waterproof Mascara is a very good value. The mascara is not a super “wet” formula - its a bit on the dry side which has its pros and cons. Pros: Will not weigh fine/thin lashes down or flatten them like some super wet mascaras will do. It is also buildable. Cons: If takes multiple applications to add real volume and thickness to your lashes.

This mascara did not cause any irritation or sensitivity and it stayed put all day long (even when sweating). It’s also easy to remove with a waterproof eye makeup remover.

I didn’t notice this mascara helping curl my lashes. I still had to use an eyelash curler to give my lashes curl.

Overall, this is a pretty good mascara. See my pictures for details. Review Title: Good value Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyebrow Tattoo Pen, Waterproof brow Pencil, Microblading Brow Pen, Natural Looking, Long Lasting (1# Light Brown) Review Date: 2021/07/09 Store: EINHOOM Average Rating: 2.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'EINHOOM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 0.79 x 0.75 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} Review Text: Updated review: This Eyebrow Tattoo Pen in light brown is a good color for light blondes! The formula advertises to be sweat proof/waterproof, but that is definitely not the case. I wore this and sweated when I wrote my initial review, but after getting wet in the rain, this product seemed to disappear (my reason for removing a star). It has a natural look to it with a 4-fork tip head that lets you create more realistic looking brows. This gets 3 stars for its wearability and durability and application. The formula goes on quite dry so you really have to work in applying yet so it looks even on both brows. However, I like the color and the fork applicator. See my pictures for a before and after (First picture is before and second picture is after application of this product). Review Title: Updated review - not waterproof Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Big Hair Claw Clips For Women - 2 PCS 4.3 Inch Large Hair Clips For Girls Nonslip Strong Hold jaw banana Matte hair clips for Thick Hair Review Date: 2021/08/20 Store: BAUTVAS Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BAUTVAS', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Claw', 'Embellishment': 'Bow', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.46 x 2.2 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'TY-us-fjia-001-2', 'UPC': '787477719412'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:e638d573d9ab99e9f8893ffcda965fcd]] These claw hair clips work great for long hair. Simple to use and holds hair in the clip all day long! See my video and picture for details. Review Title: Holds hair perfectly Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gold Collagen Under Eye Patches Mask for dark circles and puffiness by Levitural - Golden Eye Bags Treatment - Mother's Day Gift for Women Review Date: 2021/12/03 Store: LV Levitural Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LV Levitural', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Hydration', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '3.25 x 3.25 x 1.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '766234785310'} Review Text: I really like these Gold Collagen Eye Mask. I have noticed that my dark circles and fine lines seem less noticeable after wearing this for 20 minutes. The eye masks stay in place well too. I also think it’s a great value that you get 60 masks in this set! Overall, I recommend this product. Thank you for reading my review. I hope you found it helpful. Review Title: Dark circles less noticeable Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Beautiful Girl You Can Do Amazing Things, Inspirational Gifts for Women, Christmas Gifts, Amazing Gifts for Teen Girls, Beautiful Gift Makeup Bag, Inspirational Jewelry Dish, Amazing Mirror Review Date: 2021/12/05 Store: VeryMerryMakering Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 5.31 x 2.52 inches; 11.68 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8R-EFX1-UF4C', 'Department': 'girls', 'UPC': '733420649831', 'Manufacturer': 'VeryMerryMakering'} Review Text: This “beautiful girl you can do amazing things” gift set is super cute! It comes with a double mirrored compact, a cute dish that can be used to hold rings and jewelry - or even soap, and a cosmetic bag. This is very giftable. My only critique is that the cosmetic bag feels cheaply made. I still think this is a great gift for young girls or teenagers, but just know that the cosmetic bag may not be super long lasting. I love the message and think this would be very inspiring and encouraging to anyone using it! See my pictures for details. Thank you for reading my review. Review Title: Cute and giftable Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LOVE CINEMA Mascara 222 Review Date: 2022/05/29 Store: LOVE CINEMA Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LOVE CINEMA', 'Item Volume': '0.24 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof'} Review Text: I really wanted to like this mascara, but it made my thin lashes flat and did not provide any curl or volume. I wish I could recommend it, but it didn’t work for me. Thank you for reading my review. Review Title: Not for fine lashes Rating: 2.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Brush Strokes Large Ball Tip Rounder Brush (Assorted Colors) Review Date: 2019/07/26 Store: Brush Strokes Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Brush Strokes', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Special Feature': 'Not-applicable', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.8 x 2.6 x 2.6 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B004F0KBDW_US', 'UPC': '794168349933'} Review Text: Pros: This brush is so light weight and makes it so easy to create a smooth, straight look with your hair. It does not tangle at all and is easy to use.
Cons: The brush made my hair a little flat, but I have thin, fine hair that requires work to create body. Review Title: Great for smoothing and straightening hair! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cancun Collection Cacao Body Bronzer – Superfood Infused Sunless Tanning Lotion with Cacao 5.1 fl.oz, For Instant Tan in 1 minute. Review Date: 2020/02/04 Store: Cancun Collection Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Cancun Collection', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 4.6 x 1 inches; 14.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '659436986640'} Review Text: This Cancun Collection Cacao Bronzer is a fabulous alternative to getting a natural suntan from a tanning bed or from the sun due to harmful UV rays. It is also a great alternative if you do not like using self-tanners that can smell. This applies easily and blends with all skin tones. I have fair skin, but this even works on my skin color too. The bronzer blurs imperfections and stays on until you shower with soap! I recommend this product! See my pictures for more information. Review Title: Great, natural looking bronzer! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MD Complete Bright & Healthy Citrus-C Refresh Retinol + Vitamin C Multitasking Treatment Review Date: 2020/02/23 Store: MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson', 'Scent': 'Citrus', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1.25 x 4.5 inches; 2.26 Ounces', 'UPC': '850458005719'} Review Text: This MD Complete Bright & Healthy serum has all the ingredients recommended to treat fine lines, wrinkles and dull texture (Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Vitamin B, Retinol and Omega-3). However, I did not find this to be moisturizing at all and it actually dried my skin out - making my fine lines and wrinkles more noticeable. The product indicates this product is great for someone in their 20’s or 30’s - maybe that’s true, but this is not an effective product for someone 40+ dealing with aging skin. I cannot recommend this product for aging skin - maybe it’s effective for younger skin to prevent aging 🤷🏼‍♀️ - but it is not restorative if you have aging skin. Review Title: Not recommended for aging skin Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2-Pack Puretize 16.9 Oz Hand Sanitizing Gel w/Pump Tops - Extra Strength 70% Ethyl Alcohol - Moisturizing Formula with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Botanical Extracts - Quick Drying Formula Review Date: 2020/06/08 Store: Pure Daily Care Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pure Daily Care', 'Unit Count': '33.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.5 x 4.5 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '810016711360'} Review Text: This Puretize I stand hand sanitizer contains 70% ethyl alcohol and is free of dyes and strong perfumes. It has a bit of an alcohol or medicine sent but it is not overpowering. See my picture for a list of ingredients. Even though it is 70% alcohol it did not leave my skin feeling dried out. I think this is a great value for two containers it would be great to use in an office, church, school, or even at home! Overall, I like this product and recommend it! Review Title: Keeps germs away!!! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Sunsonic Electric Razor, Rechargeable Electric Shaver with Pop Up Beard Trimmer, Type-C USB Mens Electric Razor. Review Date: 2020/06/22 Store: MDDM Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MDDM', 'Special Feature': 'Rechargeable,Cordless', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Head Type': 'Rotary', 'Package Dimensions': '7.36 x 3.82 x 2.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '738629925151', 'Manufacturer': 'MDDM'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:f269f4bbb908ea03a9ffb408f24f4cd3]] This Sunsonic electric shaver for men is simple to use. It comes fully charged. To recharge it, you simply plug the cord into a usb charger and into the shaver. It does not provide a very close shave though. If you prefer a close shave, this may not be the best option for you.

If you are looking for an inexpensive electric shaver to keep in your car or in your office for emergencies, or if you are looking for one to travel with, this is a good option. The shaver also comes with a pop-up trimmer. Simply push a button on the back of the shaver and a trimmer pops up so that you can shave your neck and around ears. See my video for additional details. Review Title: Good emergency backup saver - no close shave Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: VILLAGE11FACTORY Cica Cream, Centella Soothing and Repairing Cream for Dry and Irritated Skin, Moisturizer, Anti-Wrinkles, Lightweight, Relieves Irritated Skin, Fragrance Free, Dermatologically Tested, 1.69 fl oz 50ml Review Date: 2020/06/26 Store: VILLAGE11FACTORY Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'VILLAGE11FACTORY', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'hyaluronic_acid', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 1.97 x 1.46 inches; 2.47 Ounces'} Review Text: This Derma Clear B5 Cica Cream is not oily/greasy at all. It makes my skin feel incredibly hydrating and makes my skin so very soft. It’s unclear from the packaging if this product is specifically designed to use on your face or all over. I’ve used it on my hands, elbows, and on dry spots all over my body and was pleasantly surprised at how well it worked. I didn’t notice any scent when using the lotion. My only reason for taking a star away from the rating is because of the cost of this product. You only get 1.69 fluid ounces of product, so it’s not a great value. However, I do think the product is effective! Review Title: Very moisturizing and soften skins Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine) Review Date: 2020/09/01 Store: PRETTY FRANK Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} Review Text: This Pretty Frank natural deodorant has a pretty strong Jasmine scent. The instructions say to use a piece size amount. I didn’t read that at first and applied too much making the smell over powering. If you use the appropriate amount, the smell is not too strong. It helps keep you fresh smelling all day! Keep in mind this does not have anti-perspirant in it so it will allow you to sweat. However, it should help prevent odor. I like the fact that this is aluminum free, paraben free, toxin free and petroleum free. it is also free of imitation perfumes.

So far, I like using this product but need to put it to a test on a hot humid day while exercising! If that does the trick, I will update my review to five stars. The weather in my area is very stormy, so I am unable to give this a full testing! However, this has worked for me so far wearing this under normal daily activities. Review Title: A little goes a long way! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BH DERMCENTER Retinol Serum Restores Rejuvenates and Purifies Skin, 1 oz, Reduces Appearance of Fine Lines, Non-GMO, Vegan, Cruelty Free Review Date: 2020/12/18 Store: BH DERMCENTER Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 5 inches; 1 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BHDRETSER', 'UPC': '850004068076'} Review Text: This BH DERMCENTER Retinol Serum is made in the USA. This serum is paraben free, vegan, non-GMO, and gluten free. A little of this serum goes along way. It can be used daily under your moisturizer. It contains retinal which is supposed to restore collagen to your skin, lighten dark spots, and hide fine wrinkles. Only time will tell if this serum lives up to its claims. However, I like the way it feels on my skin and it was non-irritating. Overall, I recommend this product. Review Title: Feels good on skin - non-irritating Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers Review Date: 2020/12/27 Store: LOLYSENTA Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.1 x 1.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LS17', 'UPC': '850002524062', 'Manufacturer': 'LOLYSENTA, LLC'} Review Text: This Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm is a great value for this facial kit. It’s giftable and is believed that the microneedling treatment and pink jade roller is supposed to stimulate collagen. I’ve only used both for a few days so I can’t say effective this product will be, but I’m willing to give it a try. The jade roller is great to use when applying your favorite face serum. It glides and rolls smoothly. The microneedling treatment is not too painful when you simply apply a little bit of pressure. It did not cause bleeding because I used it gently as directed. You do need to be sure to only use it on clean skin and wash it after each use. I am hoping to see more vibrant skin after using these tools for a few weeks. Review Title: Supposed to promote a more youthful appearance Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: O!GETi Vitamin C Foam Cleanser | Foaming Facial Cleanser, Perfect Pore Cleansing Foam, Face Wash for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Sebum Reducing, Moisture Control & Minimizing Pores, Korean Skin Care, Gift for Women, Paraben-free, 4.23 Oz (120g) Review Date: 2021/04/11 Store: O!GETi Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'O!GETi', 'Scent': 'Tangerine', 'Material Feature': 'Natural'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:54b0aa506bf0c71a7c1b9f3ed89e41ee]] This O!GETi vitamin C foam cleanser is a rich and thick cleaner than foams nicely on your face to help remove impurities. This leaves my face feeling very soft and looking brighter. This product includes Centella, Panthenol, Tangerine extracts, and vitamin c. It is a gentle cleanser that does not dry out my face. This does include fragrance that is not noticeable at all, and it does not irritate sensitive skin. Overall, I like this product I would recommend it. This product is made in Korea. Review Title: Foaming cleanser that brightens skin on your face Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2Pcs Mascara Black Volume and Length 4D Natural and Long Lasting Lash Blast Mascara, 0.27 Fl Oz Review Date: 2021/04/28 Store: Marine Forest Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.01 x 0.98 inches; 3.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843907382'} Review Text: This 2-piece Waterproof Mascara is a very good value. The mascara is not a super “wet” formula - its a bit on the dry side which has its pros and cons. Pros: Will not weigh fine/thin lashes down or flatten them like some super wet mascaras will do. It is also buildable. Cons: If takes multiple applications to add real volume and thickness to your lashes.

This mascara did not cause any irritation or sensitivity and it stayed put all day long (even when sweating). It’s also easy to remove with a waterproof eye makeup remover.

I didn’t notice this mascara helping curl my lashes. I still had to use an eyelash curler to give my lashes curl.

Overall, this is a pretty good mascara. See my pictures for details. Review Title: Good value Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyebrow Tattoo Pen, Waterproof brow Pencil, Microblading Brow Pen, Natural Looking, Long Lasting (1# Light Brown) Review Date: 2021/07/09 Store: EINHOOM Average Rating: 2.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'EINHOOM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 0.79 x 0.75 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} Review Text: Updated review: This Eyebrow Tattoo Pen in light brown is a good color for light blondes! The formula advertises to be sweat proof/waterproof, but that is definitely not the case. I wore this and sweated when I wrote my initial review, but after getting wet in the rain, this product seemed to disappear (my reason for removing a star). It has a natural look to it with a 4-fork tip head that lets you create more realistic looking brows. This gets 3 stars for its wearability and durability and application. The formula goes on quite dry so you really have to work in applying yet so it looks even on both brows. However, I like the color and the fork applicator. See my pictures for a before and after (First picture is before and second picture is after application of this product). Review Title: Updated review - not waterproof Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Big Hair Claw Clips For Women - 2 PCS 4.3 Inch Large Hair Clips For Girls Nonslip Strong Hold jaw banana Matte hair clips for Thick Hair Review Date: 2021/08/20 Store: BAUTVAS Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BAUTVAS', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Claw', 'Embellishment': 'Bow', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.46 x 2.2 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'TY-us-fjia-001-2', 'UPC': '787477719412'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:e638d573d9ab99e9f8893ffcda965fcd]] These claw hair clips work great for long hair. Simple to use and holds hair in the clip all day long! See my video and picture for details. Review Title: Holds hair perfectly Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gold Collagen Under Eye Patches Mask for dark circles and puffiness by Levitural - Golden Eye Bags Treatment - Mother's Day Gift for Women Review Date: 2021/12/03 Store: LV Levitural Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LV Levitural', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Hydration', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '3.25 x 3.25 x 1.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '766234785310'} Review Text: I really like these Gold Collagen Eye Mask. I have noticed that my dark circles and fine lines seem less noticeable after wearing this for 20 minutes. The eye masks stay in place well too. I also think it’s a great value that you get 60 masks in this set! Overall, I recommend this product. Thank you for reading my review. I hope you found it helpful. Review Title: Dark circles less noticeable Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Beautiful Girl You Can Do Amazing Things, Inspirational Gifts for Women, Christmas Gifts, Amazing Gifts for Teen Girls, Beautiful Gift Makeup Bag, Inspirational Jewelry Dish, Amazing Mirror Review Date: 2021/12/05 Store: VeryMerryMakering Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 5.31 x 2.52 inches; 11.68 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8R-EFX1-UF4C', 'Department': 'girls', 'UPC': '733420649831', 'Manufacturer': 'VeryMerryMakering'} Review Text: This “beautiful girl you can do amazing things” gift set is super cute! It comes with a double mirrored compact, a cute dish that can be used to hold rings and jewelry - or even soap, and a cosmetic bag. This is very giftable. My only critique is that the cosmetic bag feels cheaply made. I still think this is a great gift for young girls or teenagers, but just know that the cosmetic bag may not be super long lasting. I love the message and think this would be very inspiring and encouraging to anyone using it! See my pictures for details. Thank you for reading my review. Review Title: Cute and giftable Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LOVE CINEMA Mascara 222 Review Date: 2022/05/29 Store: LOVE CINEMA Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LOVE CINEMA', 'Item Volume': '0.24 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof'} Review Text: I really wanted to like this mascara, but it made my thin lashes flat and did not provide any curl or volume. I wish I could recommend it, but it didn’t work for me. Thank you for reading my review. Review Title: Not for fine lashes Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history indicates a strong preference for lightweight and multi-functional products, particularly in skincare and haircare. The individual favors products that enhance appearance while being non-irritating and moisturizing. Consistently positive ratings accompany items like hairbrushes, skincare serums, and hand sanitizers, suggesting an appreciation for effectiveness and ease of use. Notable dissatisfaction with anti-aging products and brow pens points to a heightened sensitivity to quality and performance, especially for mature or sensitive skin.

Common themes include an inclination towards natural ingredients and features that promote skin health, reflected in purchases of body bronzers, moisturizers, and natural deodorants. Price sensitivity is evident, particularly with items perceived as over-priced relative to their effectiveness, as seen with the Cica cream and eyebrow pen. 

Overall, the individual exhibits a preference for products that deliver reliable, practical results while aligning with a health-conscious and natural approach to beauty. They appreciate value in terms of product quantity and durability, indicating a thoughtful, quality-driven shopping behavior.

target_interaction.title: Definitely makes skin look brighter
target_interaction.text: [[VIDEOID:136c4effcf0ab94c891943cb889197d7]] This Shiny Leaf Ultra Brightening Vitamin C Serum makes your skin have a glow when followed up with moisturizer. When I first used this on my skin, I did not see any improvement or brightening effect. My skin also did not feel moisturized, however, when I applied my normal moisturizer after applying this serum, my skin looked instantly more hydrated and brightened. I am hoping over time, it will also address problem areas - like fine lines and wrinkles. This contains vitamin C and also includes other helpful ingredients like salicylic acid, vitamin E, aloe Vera and green tea. So far, I’m loving this serum and would recommend it to others!  See my video and pictures for details. Thank you for reading my review.
target_interaction.title_meta: Ultra-Brightening Vitamin C Serum, Advanced Formula with Vitamin C Concentrate, Vitamin E, Green Tea, Aloe Vera Extracts to Revive Dull Sun-Damaged Skin, Nourishing Skincare for Healthy Glowing Complexion 2 fl. oz.
